brand.name: PEP
brand.slogan: A Psychoanalytic Library at your fingertips

unknown.unexpected: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

search.heading: Your search starts here
search.subheading: Search all of the literature in PEP-WEB in seconds.

tips.instructions: ''Smart Search'' taskes all kinds of search inputs:
tips.tip1:
Find terms or keywords - to get the best search results, ''enter at least two terms at a time.'' '
'This will make the search more precise, returning only the most relevant results.
tips.tip2: Paste a reference from an article
tips.tip3: Journal name or part of a journal name
tips.tip5: Part of a title (two or more words)

guide.heading: Let PEP be your guide
guide.subheading: PEP-WEB helps to guide you to important source material in your research, and provides numerous tools.

tips.tip2: Expert guidance selects the most important related Psychoanalytic works
tips.tip3: Find what's new and exciting in the field, what others are reading
tips.tip4: What work is most cited by new publications
tips.tip5: Links content to an integrated Psychoanalytic Glossary incluing Laplanche and Pontails

empty.heading: Your search starts here
empty.instructions: Use the form on the left to enter terms or phrases and search our publication database.

tips.heading: Search tips
tips.instructions: Smart Search taskes all kinds of search inputs:
tips.tip1:
Find terms or keywords - to get the best search results, ''enter at least two terms at a time.'''
'This will make the search more precise, returning only the most relevant results.
tips.tip2: Paste a reference from an article
tips.tip3: Use a Journal name or part of a journal name
tips.tip4: Search on author name (or multiple authors)
tips.tip5: Use part of a title (two or more words)

results.none: No results found. Try using different search terms or phrases to find what you're looking for.

tooManyResults.heading: Try refining your search
tooManyResults.numResults: There are ''{count}'' {count, plural, =1 {result} other {results}} that match your criteria.
tooManyResults.instructions: Enter at least two terms, additional criteria, and/or use the 'Refine' form below to increase search precision.

refine.heading: Refine
refine.instructions: Check to limit results to only matching articles.

preview.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to read or download this document.

document.findMore: Want to find more articles and resources?
document.limitedAccess: You must be logged in to read the full document.

journals.title: 72 Premier Journals
journals.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam imperdiet, orci nec viverra feugiat, elit ligula tempor eros, et feugiat massa nibh eu nunc.

books.title: Classic Books
books.content: Mauris cursus pretium consequat. Nunc pellentesque tellus eget neque molestie, quis bibendum libero consectetur.

login.title: Login
login.info: This is the Psychoanalytic Electronic Publishing Archive full text database. It is freely available for everyone to search, view tables of contents, and view summaries. However you will need a subscription in order to view the full text of articles and books and follow links within the database.
login.error: Unable to login with the provided credentials.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.info: Customize and personalize your PEP experience using the settings below.
